QuestData.Title: Sowing Saplings
QuestData.Description: Algerson destroys the forests and leaves nothing remaining! It is up to us to take care of Azeroth, to help her live and grow as she was meant to!$b$bTake these seeds, find the soil that calls for them, and help our planet recapture her grace and vitality!
QuestData.CompletionText: After pain, there is always rebirth. Even for Azeroth!
QuestData.RewardText: Algerson's greed may have hurt this land, but it can still be saved.
